meanings.sent1: My grampa always tells me stories before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grampa at the park.
meanings.sent3: My grampa can never remember where he puts his glasses!
meanings.sent4: To me, my grampa is like a wise old oak tree, strong and full of stories.
meanings.sent5: The image of my grampa's smiling face is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an older male relative
meanings.sent1: I miss my grampa's warm hugs and kind words.
meanings.sent2: Every Sunday, we have dinner at grampa's house.
meanings.sent3: My grampa always has a twinkle in his eye when he tells jokes.
meanings.sent4: To me, grampa is like a cozy blanket on a cold day, comforting and familiar.
meanings.sent5: The sound of my grampa's laughter fills the room with joy.

meanings.definition: A male ancestor, especially one's father's father.
meanings.sent1: I feel a connection to my grampa even though I never met him.
meanings.sent2: In our family tree, my grampa's name holds a special place.
meanings.sent3: My grampa's old pocket watch is a reminder of the past.
meanings.sent4: The legacy of my grampa's hard work lives on in our family.
meanings.sent5: The stories of my grampa's adventures are like treasures to me.
